prompts: Create a new Fairy-type Pokemon that has pastel colors and a whimsical design.
Imagine a playful and cute Pokemon with pink fur and large expressive eyes.
Show me a Pokemon resembling a small bird with a sweet fragrance and soft features.
Generate a delicate and charming Pokemon that thrives in serene forest environments.
Design a Fairy-type Pokemon with a magical aura and enchanting abilities.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a fluffy cloud, floating gracefully through the air.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of sweetness and charm with vibrant colors.
